Facts about the organization
organizational facts
responses: Unisys Corporation is an American global information technology company based in Blue Bell, Pennsylvania, that provides IT services, software, and technology. It is the legacy proprietor of the Burroughs and UNIVAC line of computers, formed when the former bought the latter. It was founded in 1986. With 17,500 employees and Mr. Peter Altabef as the current CEO, the company's annual revenue was 2.026 Billion USD by 2020. With head quarters at Blue Bell in Pennsylvania, United States, the company operates at various places all around the world.

websites.text: LinkedIn Account of Unisys
Official Website of Unisys

responses: The current CEO of Unisys Organization is Mr. Peter Altabef, who was officially named as CEO from January 1, 2015. Peter A. Altabef has served as chair of the board of Unisys Corporation since April 2018, and as CEO of Unisys since January 2015. He also served as president of the company from September 2015 to March 2020. Please visit the official website of Unisys Organization for further details about the leaders

websites.text: Information about the leaders from Unisys Official Website
Information about the CEO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about the CEO
Tell me about the Chief Executive Officer
responses:
Chief Executive Officer - Peter Altabef.
Peter A. Altabef has served as chair of the board of Unisys Corporation since April 2018, and as CEO of Unisys since January 2015. He also served as president of the company from September 2015 to March 2020.

websites.text: Information about the leaders from Unisys Official Website
Information about the CEO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about the COO
Tell me about the Chief Operating Officer
responses:
President and Chief Operating Officer - Eric Hutto. 
 Eric Hutto was elected president and chief operating officer effective March 2020. From September 2015 to March 2020, he served as senior vice president and president, Enterprise Solutions. Eric joined the company in April 2015 and previously served as vice president/general manager, U.S. & Canada, Unisys Enterprise Solutions. Eric leads the company’s business worldwide and is responsible for sales, client relationships, service delivery and portfolio management.

websites.text: Information about the COO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about the CSO
Tell me about the Chief Security and Infrastructure Officer
responses:
Senior Vice President and Chief Security and Infrastructure Officer - Mathew Newfield. 
 Mathew Newfield is senior vice president and Chief Security and Infrastructure Officer (CSIO) of Unisys. The CSIO organization comprises the former Unisys Information Technology (UIT) and Chief Information Security Office (CISO) organizations. Mathew joined Unisys in March 2018 as Chief Information Security Officer. He has more than 19 years of experience in Information Technology, with a focus on security, software-as-a-service operations, risk auditing and management and international mergers and acquisitions.

websites.text: Information about the CSO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about CHO
Tell me about CHRO
Tell me about the Chief Human Resources Officer
Tell me about CHO/CHRO
responses:
Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer - Katie Ebrahimi 
 .Katie Ebrahimi is senior vice president and Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO) at Unisys. She joined the company in April 2018. As CHRO, she is responsible for leading and operationalizing on a global basis all of Unisys' human capital strategies including organizational design and effectiveness; associate training, evaluation and retention; leadership and career development; diversity; and talent acquisition.

websites.text: Information about the CHO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about CTO
Tell me about the Chief Technology Officer
responses:
Chief Technology Officer and Senior Vice President, Solution Innovation and Architecture - Dwayne L. Allen 
 Dwayne L. Allen is chief technology officer and senior vice president, Solution Innovation and Architecture at Unisys. In this role, he drives identification of innovative technologies in cloud, end-user experience and enterprise computing to benefit Unisys clients and their customers. He also oversees integration of those technologies into solutions that Unisys’ global business units provide.

websites.text: Information about CTO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about the CMO
Tell me about the Chief Marketing Officer
responses:
Senior Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer - Teresa Poggenpohl 
Teresa Poggenpohl is senior vice president and chief marketing officer at Unisys. She joined the company in May 2021 and is responsible for telling the Unisys story and accelerating awareness for its solutions in helping position the company for future growth.

websites.text: Information about CMO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about the CRO
Tell me about the Chief Revenue Officer
responses:
Senior Vice President and Chief Revenue Officer - Maureen Sweeny 
Maureen Sweeny is senior vice president and chief revenue officer at Unisys. In this role, she enhances and extends our existing client relationships as well as drives solution-oriented, advisory-led sales for Digital Workplace Services, Cloud and Infrastructure and Unisys Stealth.

websites.text: Information about CRO from Unisys Official Website

patterns: Tell me about the CFO
Tell me about the Chief Financial Officer
responses:
Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer - Mike Thomson 
Michael M. Thomson is Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Unisys. He joined the company in December 2015 and is today responsible for all of Unisys' financial functions including controllership, treasury, taxes, internal audit, financial systems, investor relations and M&A as well as strategy.

websites.text: Information about CFO from Unisys Official Website

Eric leads the company’s business worldwide and is responsible for sales, client relationships, service delivery and portfolio management.

What are the companies in business alliance with Unisys?
responses: The Unisys Strategic Alliance program enables collaborative innovation and the development of new joint solution offerings, which provide clients cutting-edge products and services in many of the largest industries in the world. Our Alliance Program mission is to create strong and lasting profitable partnerships with key organizations designed to strengthen our clients' businesses. Unisys, as a trusted partner, provides leading technology, software and services companies, the opportunity to build, market, and co-sell value added joint solutions that address our client’s most challenging business requirements. Clients look to Unisys to provide independent advisement, quality services, and essential capabilities to ensure their mission critical projects succeed. The organization is currently in alliance with AWS, Microsoft, Dell Technologies and ServiceNow

websites.text: Information about the business partners of Unisys

patterns: How unisys is in partnership with AWS?
Explain the alliance of Unisys with AWS
Explain the partnership of unisys with AWS
How unisys is in alliance with AWS?
responses: Unisys and AWS accelerate the adoption of cloud and cloud services, securely, so our clients can achieve their business goals more quickly and efficiently than ever before. Together, we enable your organization to respond quickly to constituents while incorporating cloud technology and creating predictable revenue streams. Unisys, an Amazon Web Services (AWS) Advanced Consulting partner, protects enterprise network connections to the AWS cloud from cybercriminals. With our AWS’ Government Competency, Unisys enables client’s convenient protection of vital information with the only NSA- and CSIC-certified solution on AWS. Unisys holds the exclusive AWS MSP Collaborates designation and we are also a Well Architected Framework (WAF) partner. We also help our clients develop cloud strategies, create actionable migration plans, design and build cloud environments, and facilitate day-to-day cloud operations and management. Please visit the official website to know further details.

websites.text: Information about the partnership with AWS

patterns: How unisys is in partnership with ServiceNow?
Explain the alliance of Unisys with ServiceNow
Explain the partnership of unisys with ServiceNow
How unisys is in alliance with ServiceNow?
responses: Unisys is a Global Partner to ServiceNow®, the enterprise cloud company. This strategic alliance delivers integrated Service Management solutions for enterprise clients around the world. Unisys is a ServiceNow Elite Sales Partner. We are also a design partner for IT Operations Management, Field Services and Intelligent Agent, currently responsible for managing some of the largest ServiceNow deployments globally. Unisys is also a ServiceNow Technology Partner where we enable secure operations through the integration of Unisys Stealth with ServiceNow SecOps workflows.

websites.text: Information about the partnership with ServiceNow

patterns: How unisys is in partnership with Microsoft?
Explain the alliance of Unisys with Microsoft
Explain the partnership of unisys with Microsoft
How unisys is in alliance with Microsoft?
responses: As a Microsoft Gold Partner, Unisys holds eleven Microsoft Gold and Silver Competencies including Cloud Productivity, Cloud Platform and Application Development. Unisys is a Microsoft Azure Expert MSP partner and Unisys is the titleholder of Azure Innovation Partner of the Year in 2015 and 2017. We are a three-year leader in Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for End-User Outsourcing Services, North America.

websites.text: Information about the partnership with Microsoft

patterns: How unisys is in partnership with Dell Technologies?
Explain the alliance of Unisys with Dell Technologies
Explain the partnership of unisys with Dell Technologies
How unisys is in alliance with Dell Technologies?
responses: Unisys and Dell Technologies, work with our customers to drive innovation, deliver solutions with global reach and provide seamless service for long-term customer satisfaction. Together, we help customers solve their business challenges with secure solutions reliably and efficiently by providing complete, end-to-end solutions designed even for the most demanding IT environments. Through our partnership, we deliver secure solutions to demanding environments like banking, airline reservations and cargo handling. We address high-transaction environments supporting police, port authorities, government agencies and commercial enterprises worldwide.

websites.text: Information about the partnership with Dell

responses: Motto of the Organization / Company is "Secure Your Tomorrow"

"Secure Your Tomorrow" - Unisys is a global IT company known for building highly secure, modern digital platforms. We accelerate industry-leading digital workplace services, deliver next-generation cloud and infrastructure services, and provide the world’s most secure operating environment for high-intensity enterprise computing. And, we integrate security into all of our solutions.

responses: There are Operations Teams, Project Teams, Support Teams and Process Teams
We have Operations Teams, Project Teams, Support Teams and Process Teams

patterns: operations of a Operation team
Task of a Operation team
What would a Operation team do?
functions of a Operation team
responses: These teams are focused on operating technology infrastructure (such as networks, data centers and Web services), monitoring them and ensuring services and systems are available and performing normally to support business operations

patterns: operations of a Project team
Task of a Project team
What would a Project team do?
functions of a project team
responses: Project teams are typically focused on a single release or group of releases, but very rarely “own” a system once it goes live.

patterns: operations of a Support team
Task of a Support team
What would a Support team do?
functions of a support team
responses: IT support teams are permanent, which (like operations teams) execute IT service management functions to help keep business operations up and running smoothly. The work of these team is also similar to project teams as they also address specific problems.

patterns: operations of a Process team
Task of a Process team
What would a Process team do?
functions of a process team
responses: These teams (also sometimes known as IT business-support teams) are permanent and tasked with owning, managing and improving the IT systems of a specific business process.

Digital Investors, Unisys Agile Business Suite, Unisys Business Information Server, Unisys ClearPath AIS, Unisys ClearPath Forward, Unisys ClearPath MCP, Unisys ClearPath OS 2200, Unisys CloudForte, Unisys Cyber Risk Management, Unisys Data Exchange, Unisys Enterprise DevOps Services, Unisys InteliServe, Unisys Stealth(aware), Unisys Stealth(Cloud), Unisys Stealth(Identity), Unisys Stealth(Core) and Unisys Stealth(mobile)

Unisys Agile Business Suite

responses: Unisys Agile Business Suite (AB Suite®) is a unique Model Driven development environment for mission critical solutions. It helps you capitalize on change rather than simply respond to it. It supports design, development, generation, and ongoing maintenance of high-performance, highly available, enterprise-class applications.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys ClearPath Forward
What is Unisys ClearPath Forward?
Describe Unisys ClearPath Forward
Unisys ClearPath Forward
Uses of Unisys ClearPath Forward
Applications of Unisys ClearPath Forward
responses: As the system of record at the heart of your business and IT operations, your Unisys ClearPath Forward® system will play a central role in supporting your ongoing digital business transformation. The vast array of ClearPath Forward® products work together to enable this transformation – and deliver the unmatched security, scalability, reliability, capacity, availability, and data integrity needed to handle some of the world’s largest workloads with ease.

websites.text: Information about ClearPathForward products from Unisys Website

patterns: Tell me about Unisys CloudForte

Unisys CloudForte

responses: Unisys CloudForte® accelerates your digital transformation and maximizes innovation in the cloud without sacrificing security or governance. CloudForte® enables you to accelerate your success with self-service blueprints, automated governance and workflow, automated provisioning, security, reporting and advanced analytics.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys Cyber Risk Management
What is Unisys Cyber Risk Management?
Describe Unisys Cyber Risk Management
Unisys Cyber Risk Management
Uses of Unisys Cyber Risk Management
Applications of Unisys Cyber Risk Management
responses: With TrustCheck™, Unisys transforms the cyber risk conversation, enabling organizations to align their security initiatives with their business strategy. TrustCheck™ describes the likelihood and impact of a cyber-event across a multitude of attack patterns and threats.

Unisys Data Exchange

responses: Unisys Data Exchange is data integration software that is designed to help organizations address these issues. It is available as a software option for ClearPath MCP and ClearPath OS 2200 servers.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys InteliServe

Unisys InteliServe
Uses of Unisys InteliServe

responses: The InteliServe platform provides an integrated suite of best-in-class technologies that provide omni-channel support, advanced analytics, automation, artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning and identity authentication.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys Stealth(aware)
What is Unisys Stealth(aware)?
Describe Unisys Stealth(aware)
Unisys Stealth(aware)
Uses of Unisys Stealth(aware)
Applications of Unisys Stealth(aware)
responses: Stealth(aware)™ provides you with powerful live discovery, modeling and visualization to see network relationships and use micro-segmentation to isolate trusted entities. Increased traffic insight informs your decisions to permit, restrict or block access to sensitive data—then automatically deploy those policies to endpoints.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys Stealth(cloud)
What is Unisys Stealth(cloud)?
Describe Unisys Stealth(cloud)
Unisys Stealth(cloud)
Uses of Unisys Stealth(cloud)
Applications of Unisys Stealth(cloud)
responses: Stealth(cloud)™ easily extends protection across public and private networks. Identity-driven micro-segmentation isolates critical assets and data encryption protects data in motion to reduce attack surfaces on virtual machines. Stealth(cloud)™ supports leading cloud platforms such as Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys Stealth(mobile)
What is Unisys Stealth(mobile)?
Describe Unisys Stealth(mobile)
Unisys Stealth(mobile)
Uses of Unisys Stealth(mobile)
Applications of Unisys Stealth(mobile)
responses: Stealth(mobile)™ extends Stealth(core)™ protection to mobile environments, closing security gaps outside the scope of enterprise mobility management (EMM) solutions.

patterns: Tell me about Unisys Stealth(Identity)
What is Unisys Stealth(Identity)?
Describe Unisys Stealth(Identity)
Unisys Stealth(Identity)
Uses of Unisys Stealth(Identity)
Applications of Unisys Stealth(Identity)
responses: Flexible biometric identity management delivers stronger security and frictionless experiences

patterns: Tell me about Unisys Stealth(core)
What is Unisys Stealth(core)?
Describe Unisys Stealth(core)
Unisys Stealth(core)
Uses of Unisys Stealth(core)
Applications of Unisys Stealth(core)
responses: Stealth(core)™ provides foundational capabilities —identity-based microsegmentation, cryptographic cloaking and encryption of data in motion — for transforming your existing networks into Zero Trust Networks without the added implementation and management complexity.

patterns: operations of a Business Analyst
task of a Business Analyst
what would a business analyst do ?
responses: Business analyst is a member of a product development team who analyzes the business domain, documents its processes and systems, outlines business requirements, and matches a software business model with the software being built.

patterns: operations of a Project Manager
Task of a Project Manager
What would a Project Manager do ?
responses: Software project manager defines the requirements of the project, builds the project team, lays out a blue print for the whole project including the project scope and parameters, clearly communicates the goals of the project to the team

patterns: operations of a UX Designer
Task of a UX Designer
What would a UX Designer do ?
responses: UX Developers must have a great understanding of user behavior and can be viewed as part psychologist and part web developer
UX developer is responsible for the website or application experience of visitors

patterns: operations of a Front-end Developer
Task of a Front-end Developer
What would a Front-end Developer do ?
responses: Front-end Developer be responsible for implementing visual elements that are visible from the computer users vantage point within a web application.
Front-end Developer will be responsible for the translation of UI/UX design wireframes to actual code.

patterns: operations of a Back-end Developer
Task of a Back-end Developer
What would a Back-end Developer do ?
responses: Back-end web developer is responsible for server-side web application logic and integration of the work front-end developers do
Back-end developers are usually write the web services and APIs used by front-end developers and mobile application developers.

patterns: operations of a Quality Assurance Engineer
Task of a Quality Assurance Engineer
What would a Quality Assurance Engineer do ?
responses: Software quality assurance engineer is someone who monitors every phase of the software development process so as to ensure design quality, making sure that the software adheres to the standards set by the development company.

responses: There are Healthy Living Club, Investment Club, Book Club and Sports Club in Unisys
We have Healthy Living Club, Investment Club, Book Club and Sports Club in Unisys

patterns: Activities of Healthy Living Club
Events conducted in Healthy Living Club
Get-together by Healthy Living Club
responses: From sharing healthy recipe ideas to enjoying 30-minutes of yoga to minimize stress levels, employees can focus on healthy living by forming a club in the workplace.

The healthy living club can meet to share healthy, baked snacks, train together for marathons, take after-work walks through the neighborhood and discuss and implement ways to make the workplace healthier.

patterns: Activities of Investment Club
Events conducted in Investment Club
Get-together by Investment Club
responses: Employees who want to learn more about investing may take an interest in a workplace investment club
The club works together to identify potentially profitable stocks, then pools together a designated amount of money as a contribution toward the stocks.
Employees can set up an account to keep track of the money they earn and lose.

patterns: Activities of Book Club
Events conducted in Book Club
Get-together by Book Club
responses: Employees can read business-specific books on topics such as marketing, management, leadership, creativity or motivation.
There are a variety of book clubs designed to accommodate readers' diverse interests that you can use to model a book club for your company.

patterns: Activities of Sports Club
Events conducted in Sports Club
Get-together by Sports Club
responses: We encourage physical fitness, healthy living and team work by organizing a morning or evening sports club for Employees
We basically focus on one sport, such as softball, if the majority of your employees agree, or you can play a different sport each time you meet
